text: @Javedakhtarjadu Do you advocate that police shouldn't perform duties unless Covid-19 chapter is over;meanwhile all accused fly for shelter UAE? I've known you as an atheist but your public posts refute your claim.Under the guise of Modi protest, your inclination towards radicalisation is exposed
